definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Swtich to renewable sources of energy.
This is an important way to make the Renewable Energy Law to realize its ideal value.
sentences.chinese: 這是保證《可再生能源法》發揮理想價值的重要路徑。

sentences.english: Advanced energy storage will build further capability to use renewable energy sources.
sentences.chinese: 先進的儲能技術將進一步使用可再生能源。

sentences.english: And this could be key to achieving an almost wholly renewable electricity supply.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是實現幾乎所有可再生能源電力供應的關鍵。

sentences.english: Most contemporary buildings are a major drain on non-renewable resources.
sentences.chinese: 當代大部分建築都未能充分利用可再生能源。

sentences.english: Around the world are actively deal with the question of non-renewable energy crisis.
sentences.chinese: 全球各地都在積極應對不可再生能源危機這一問題。

sentences.english: It is the first ofits kind to be fuelled entirely by renewable energy.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一個採用可再生能源燃料電池的機器人。

sentences.english: I think, so potentially around renewable energy.
sentences.chinese: 應該是有關可再生能源方面的政策制定吧。

sentences.english: Imagine a US-China renewable energy initiative, along the lines of the US-Soviet space station.
sentences.chinese: 試着沿美蘇空間站的思路想象美中可再生能源倡議。

sentences.english: The green ecotypic buildings require to use a green renewable energy.
sentences.chinese: 綠色生態建築中需要採用綠色可再生能源。

sentences.english: Fast-tracks approval for new renewable energy plants.
sentences.chinese: 快速軌道批准新的可再生能源植物。

sentences.english: We are now formulating a plan for development of renewable energy.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在制定一個發展可再生能源的計劃。

sentences.english: Renewables would have a clearer run at that segment of the market.
sentences.chinese: 在市場的這一領域內，可再生能源的趨勢將更加清晰。

sentences.english: A review on the research advances of hydrogen production in Chlamydomonas reinhardtii as a renewable energy source was presented.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了利用衣藻生產氫氣作爲再生能源的研究進展。

sentences.english: Like the renewable energy standard. Or efficiency rules.
sentences.chinese: 像可再生能源標準，或效能規則。

sentences.english: What's needed, he says, is renewable energy that's cheap and won't run out.
sentences.chinese: 他說現在需要的是低價，用之不竭的可再生能源。

definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
